name: Survive Outdoors Longer Escape Lite Bivy Sack
description: Water-resistant and breathable, this emergency bivy sack helps you stay dry and warm through unplanned nights out. This model is light enough to throw in your pack for "what-if" situations or as a fast/light option for getting an alpine start.Material reflect up to 70% of radiated body heat.Hard-wearing fabric resists punctures and tears through heavy use.High-viz orange is easy for rescuers to spot.Stuff sack included.
